title: Our Projects
subtitle: Explore our portfolio of innovative digital solutions that have helped some of our clients achieve their needs.

kanban.title: Kanban App
kanban.description: A free and open source simple kanban board application for quick task management with drag-and-drop functionality, task assignments, and progress tracking.

teamScheduler.title: Team Scheduler App
teamScheduler.description: A free and open source collaborative calendar application that allows teams to schedule work shifts, drag and drop schedules, and more. Effortlessly schedule shifts for your team!

secureMail.title: Secure Mail
secureMail.description: An encrypted email platform with advanced security features, ensuring your communications remain private and protected.

clueCam.title: ClueCam
clueCam.description: A mobile application that uses the camera to locate objects in real-time, perfect for learning and exploring.
